name: Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust
name_original: Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust
description:
Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust is an arcade game developed by Team17 Digital. It was originally released in 2009. Codemasters published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
